divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS DRIVING HOME AFTER WORK WHEN I LOOKED UP AND SAW A HUGE CRAFT TRIANGULAR IN SHAPE WITH 3 WHITE LIGHTS ON CORNER AND RED PULSATING LIGHT AT CENTER OF CRAFT. I WAS DRIVING AND AT TIME OCJECT WAS ABOVE ME IT TURNED AND FLEW IN STRAIGHT PATH. I STOPED AT TRAFFIC LIGHTS AND RECORDED OBJECT ON PHONE. THIS OBJECT WAS ENORMOUS AND CLEAR TO THE NAKED EYE. NEVER EVER SEEN ANYTHING LIKE IT EVER BUT WHEN RESEARCHING INTERNET STUMBLED ACROSS THE DUDLEY DORITO AND SOMETHIND SUPPOSEDLY GOVERNMENT CALLED BR3B BUT ALSO LOOKING FURTHER BACK AND CAME ACROSS SOMETHING THAT HAPPENED IN BRUSSELS YEARS AGO AND IM 100% SURE IT WAS THE SAME CRAFT ONLY DIFFERENCE BEING THE RED PULSATING LIGHT EMITTING FORM CENTRE OF CRAFT. CRAFT WAS SILENT AND IT WAS SHOCKING TO THINK IF IT WAS GOVERNMENT WHY SO VISIBLE. IT DIDNT TRY TO HIDE OR MOVE FAST BUT WAS HUGE. NEARLY CRASHED MY CAR I WAS THAT SHOCKE. HAVE VIDEO BUT FILE VERY LARGE
trends: There have been 57 other sightings in birmingham
There were no other sightings in birmingham on or around December 7th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: ON WAY HOME AFTER WPRK HUGE TRIANGLE ABOVE HEAD PERFECTLY CLEAR TO HUMAN EYE NO SOUND
